title: My Projects
description: Manage your UX research. Create new projects or continue working with existing ones.
signInDescription: Create and manage your UX research

management.title: Project Management
management.description: Create and organize your UX research

createProject.title: Create New Project
createProject.description: Fill in information about your new UX project
createProject.contextPlaceholder: For example: Mobile app for food ordering. Main audience - young people 18-35 years old. Key goals: fast order processing, convenient menu navigation, transparent payment system...
createProject.contextNote: This context will be applied to all audits in the project

empty.title: You don't have any projects yet
empty.description: Create your first project to start UX research and interface analysis

delete.title: Delete project?
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete project "{name}"? This action cannot be undone. All audits in this project will also be deleted.
